message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.HC 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the application of computer vision and deep learning in recognizing traditional Bengali games. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The use of deep learning models for classification also falls under the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Additionally, the paper discusses the potential applications of the proposed approach in gaming and sports, which could fall under the graphics (cs.GR) sub-category. Finally, the paper also discusses the potential impact of the proposed approach on human-computer interaction, which could fall under the human-computer interaction (cs.HC) sub-category.
